descriptionHtml:
Use teddybear as decoration, 12 type of placement, see image.
First, craft basic Teddy (Teddy on chest) in smithing forge under Jewelry.
Then, craft any type of Teddy, using basic Teddy and leatherstrip.
Requires UNPB-TBBP.

Credits to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16625/]Tamira and Arion for creation Teddybear model[/url]

My other mods:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33968/]Lossless Race Change[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49598/]Serafym71 Azzi Eng Sub[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51290/]Serafym71 Courier Oufit UNPB-TBBP[/url]
author: serafym71
